author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

In PR https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/10646, @rjmholt brings up a [good point](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/10646#discussion_r330809022) that to further improve the user experience, tab completion should respect constraints on allowed values to the variable.

# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

@rjmholt's [comment](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/10646#discussion_r330809022) suggests implementation details
title: Support type constraints on variable for tab completion
